segments.text: Observing this kitchen drawing, I take in all the details calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, towel in hand, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, causing the basin to overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down the front, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, her foot touching the edge of the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy climbs a stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate is in his other hand, perhaps to hold cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, looking unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a neat garden is visible outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene mixes routine with subtle disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR
